articles.content: There have been ongoing, years-long arguments in Iowa high school wrestling circles about which class is the best class. Is it 1A, with its tiny-but-mighty programs? Is it 2A, which often fields powe… [+9559 chars]

articles.author: Dustin Long
articles.title: JR Motorsports watches chances to win Daytona Xfinity race slip away - NASCAR on NBC Sports
articles.description: JR Motorsports had four cars behind leader Austin Hill in the final laps but didn't win after one car spun, another crash and a third ran out of fuel.
articles.content:
